text: boyopsee kee report aate hee ghar bhar mein duhkh kee lahar chha gaee
kainsar ke kan rakt mein vidyamaan the
doktar ne kaha tha jeene kee tamanna lie raho
ho sakata hai jo hai jahaan hai vaheen ruka rahe aur kaee varshon tak kuchh na ho
yah badh bhee sakata hai ek din mein bhee aur ek saal mein bhee
abhee dard hai usee ke saath jeena padega
jab kuchh aur shareer mein badalaav aaega tabhee bimaaree baahar jhalakegee
dev niraash man lie laut aaya
kuchh bhee nahin bolane kee sthiti mein tha
din bhar bistar par leta raha
aaj dard nahin tha
yadi tha bhee to usaka kasht shareer mahasoos nahin kar raha tha
man kee teesen usase kaheen adhik theen
veena din bhar rotee rahee
kaun dhaadhas bandhaata use maan krshna apane putr ko hataash pade dekhakar stabdh thee
javaan beta usaka bheetar hee bheetar khokhala ho raha hai use dekhakar usake chehare ko dekhakar use vishvaas nahee ho raha tha
dekhane mein bhalaachanga kaheen doktar hee to kuchh galat naheeai kah rahe
veena ko bhee dhaadhas bandhaate hue vah yahee bolee betee mujhe to lagata hai doktar kee riport jhoothee hai
dekho dev ko dekho kuchh bhee to nahee dikh raha usake chehare se
sab kuchh theek to dikh raha hai
dard kise nahin hota aise mein dard se kya kainsar kee shuruaat ho sakatee hai
maan ko kya kahatee veena chup rahee
pita shreeraam shoony mein baithe rahe
man ke bhaav stabdh the
unhee ko samajhaane ke lie shreemadbhaagavat geeta padhane lage
shaayad geeta ke shabd unhen saantvana de sakate the
yahee bhaav unhonne veena ke sammukh prakat kie betee vyarth chinta mat karo
geeta ka paath karo
dev ko bhee sunao
dekhana man ko raah milegee
veena tab bhee chup rahee
kuchh na bolee
bas aansuo ko rokane ka prayatn karatee rahee
yahee usakee dinacharya ban gaee
dev ko dard hota paanee kee garm botal ka sek use karatee
kabhee dard kee golee khilaatee
kabhee ghanton usakee maalish karatee
aaraam milata dev ko to kolej chala jaata
kisakis ko bataata apana kasht
aaj usake kasht kee saathee veena thee
veena ko dev ka kasht apana lagane laga tha
aur vah apane kasht kee thaah lene kee bajae dev ke kasht ko door karana chaahatee thee
dev ko vah kasht mukt dekhana chaahatee thee
kuchh baaten hamen sikhaee nahin jaatee
kuchh baaten hamen bataee nahin jaateen
ve janm se hee hamaare saath hotee hai
vahee baaten hamaare sanskaar hotee hai
yah sanskaar palapratipal vikasit hote hai hamaare aasapaas ke vaataavaran se
veena ke man mein rachebase sanskaar vikasit hue the vyavasthit rup se chalate apane ghar se apane maataapita se
yahee bhaav rache base the ki ek achchhee patnee duhkh mein sadaiv apane pati ka saath detee hai
yahee bhaav use dev kee seva mein lagae rahate the
dev niraash ho chuka tha
usee niraasha mein aasha kee kiran banee dikhatee thee use veena
apane har dard ka utar vah veena mein hee khojata tha
aankh band karake bharosa kar raha tha vah veena par
duhkh mein patnee se bada koee maargadarshak nahin lagata vyakti ko
ab kya hoga veena jis doktar par bharosa kiya usane kuchh nahin kiya
ab vakt gujar chuka hai
ab kuchh nahin ho sakata
dev ke shabd dard lie the
sab theek ho jaega
chinta na karo dev
ham pooree koshish karenge
veena phir se sambhalee
dev ke shabd vahee the
vahee baarabaar ek hee baat duhara raha tha
tum kaise kah sakatee ho ki main kabhee theek bhee ho sakoonga dev jaise aasha bhare shabd sunana chaahata tha
tum theek ho jaoge
ham badesebade aspataal mein jaenge
har doktar se milenge
kaheen na kaheen koee na koee chamatkaar hoga
meree tapasya hai
eeshvar hamaaree madad karega
tum chinta chhod do
jeene kee tamanna jaagrat kie raho
veena chaahatee thee dev aashaavaadee rahe
aur yahee usakee koshish thee
amit kee apanee duniya chhoteesee hokar rah gaee thee
dev ke saath yadi kahee jaana nahin hota tha to apane kaam par jaata tha varana kaam suparavaeejar sateesh kee dekhabhaal mein chal raha tha
usakee ek hee chinta thee
bhaee theek ho jae
usaka achchhe se achchha ilaaj ho
veena ko koee kasht na ho
ghar me rahata ya devaveena ke saath kisee doktar ke paas jaata ya kaam mein vyast rahata
hamesha bhaav ek hee the usake
pooree tanmayata se apana kartavy poora karane ke
shaam ko dev ko theek paata to veena va dev ke saath kaheen ghoomane chala jaata tha
kabhee pramod aa jaata to ghar par hee baithakar vah batiya lete the
veena ke saath hansanaabaaten karana apane man kee har baat usase kahana use achchha lagane laga tha
veena ka svabhaav dekhakar vah man hee man usakee pooja karane laga tha
veena kee har chaah ko poora karana use achchha lagata tha
unake saath baajaar jaata dekhata veena kee aankhen jahaan kabhee kisee shovindo par tikee jaraasa aabhaas hota ki koee cheej use bha gaee hai to tatkaal vah cheej veena ke lie khareed leta
veena ko achchha lagata tha lekin kabheekabhee dev se vah kahatee amit bahut karata hai hamaare lie mujhe kabheekabhee sankoch hota hai
tab dev kaha karata sankoch kis baat ka
mera chhota bhaee hai
achchha kamaata hai aur mujhase bahut lagaav hai use
jab aaj tak usane meree har cheej ka dhyaan rakha hai to tumhaare lie kahaan peechhe rahega
vah mera priy hai use apana priy maano
tab veena kuchh na kah sakee dev ko
akele kabhee sochatee to use amit ke prati bahut pyaar aata
usakee mangalakaamana karatee
amit kee chaahat priya ko apana banaane kee hai yah vah jaanatee thee
use amitapriya kee jodee kee kalpana karana pasand tha
lekin ab vah apane ghar vaalon se ya amit se is baat ka jikr nahin karatee thee
maan ko usane dev ka haal likh diya tha
sabhee sunakar stabdh rah gae the
lekin koee kuchh na bol paaya
veena ne maan ko apanee jaan kee kasam de dee thee
usane apane har patr mein dev ke prati apana pyaar dev kee dherasee achchhaeeyon ka itana adhik vivaran likha tha ki ve bhee dev kee mangalakaamana dinaraat karane lage the
unake dev ke prati dev ke parivaar ke prati saare gileshikave un mangalakaamanaon mein dab se gae the
amit bhee jaanata tha unake aakrosh ko
lekin priya ke prati jo bhaavanaen usake man mein umadee rahatee theen unhen vah apane se alag nahin kar paata tha
usaka man usake paksh mein yahee gavaahee deta thee ki is sab mein usaka usake man ka kya dosh veena ka vivaah dev se hona chaahie tha ki nahin
veena se veena ke parivaar vaalon se yadi koee baat chhipaee gaee ya nahin isaka use koee gyaan nahin tha
haan yadi shaadee se pahale kisee ne usase kuchh poochha hota to vah sab baat unhen jarur bataata
veena ne hee sab baaten use bataee theen
vah veena ke bhaavon ko apane man mein samete tha
jab kabhee veena kee dasha kee sochata to bahut pareshaan ho uthata
aise mein jab prem rajanee kee shaadee kee taiyaaree ke lie ghar ja raha tha tab usane hee dev ke vishay mein saaree baat bataee thee
prem sunakar sakate mein aa gaya tha
veena se usane alag baithakar baat bhee kee
lekin veena ke manobhaav usake man ko chhoo gae the
vah apane badee deedee ke man ko samajhakar natamastak ho gaya tha
usake man mein dev ke prati umad aaya aakrosh bhee shaant ho gaya tha
vah dev ko saantvana deta raha aur amit ke saath ghulamil gaya tha
amit bhee svayan ko aparaadhabhaav se mukt pa raha tha
iseelie usaka premil man priya ke vishay me sochane se svayan ko nahin rok pa raha tha
vah priya ke prati apane man mein badhatee divaanagee ko apanee daayaree ke panno mein utaarata rahata tha
veena ke naam maan ka patr aaya tha
dev ke paas baithakar use padhane lagee
patr dekhakar hee bachapan se lekar javaanee tak maan se mila pyaar aankhon mein chhalak aaya
maan ne likha thaah
meree pyaaree veena
tumhen maan ka aasheesh
kitanee baar socha tumhen patr likhoon lekin mere haath kaanpane lagate the
kuchh samajh nahee aata tha man jaise shoony mein ja khada hota tha
meree nanheesee gudiya par bhagavaan ne kaise duhkhon ka pahaad khada kar diya
dev jee par aaee vipatti ke baare mein prem se maaloom pad gaya
man chaaha aaoon tumhaare paas
lekin himmat meree javaab de jaatee hai
tumhaare man ke duhkh ko yaheen baithee main bhaanp sakatee hoon
tumane dev ke prati apana jeevan samarpit kar rakha hai tumhaaree tapasya saphal ho yahee kaamana karatee hoon har dam
lekin meree kaamana kab pooree hogee kab tum hansate huee mere paas aaogee main nahin jaanatee
ghar mein hamaare haradam jo hansee chhaayee rahatee thee aaj vahaan chuppee hai
devata svarup jis pati ka tumane varan kiya use aaj grahan laga hai aisa soch kar na to kuchh karane ka man karata hai na hee kuchh kiya bhee jaata hai
bachche hai sabhee apaneeapanee padhaee mein vyast rahate hue bhee tumhaaree hee baat karate hain
daidee jee tumhaare gumasum apanee poojaapaath mein lage rahate hai
unakee aastha eeshvar par pahale se bhee adhik ho chukee hai
jab bhee tumhaaree baat hotee hai yahee kahate hai mainne aaj tak kisee ko duhkh nahee pahunchaaya
eeshvar mere bachchon ka baalabaanka bhee nahee kar sakata
dekh lena yah veena kee pareeksha ho rahee hai bas
duhkh kee ghadee jald hee tal jaegee
meree veena kee pareeksha jald hee samaapt ho jaegee aur usake duhkh sab mit jaenge
meree bachchee jis tarah hansatee thee vaise hee hansa karegee
tum patr jab bhee likhatee ho apanee dhun mein magn rahatee ho
maan ka haal poochhatee ho bahanon kee khabar rakhatee ho lekin apane man kee baat kuchh nahin kahatee
bas maan ke lie do hee shabd bache hai tumhaare paas ki maan main kushalata se hoon ki maan bas eeshvar se praarthana karo ki mera dev theek ho jae
kuchh to likho apane man kee baat
tum apane man kee nahin kahatee
kuchh to likh diya karo
maan ka man kuchh to halka pad jaega
aaj hee rajanee kee saas ka patr mila
shaadee kee sab taiyaaree pooree ho chukee hai
prem ne yahaan sab intajaam kar lie hain
ab yahee meree praarthana hai ki tum aur dev jee shaadee se kuchh din pahale jarur aa jao
dev jee kee pareshaanee main samajh sakatee hoon
lekin yah ghar bhee unhee ka hai
shaadee kee raunak mein kuchh samay ke lie vah bhee kasht bhool jaenge
unaka man bhee bahal jaega
tumhaare daidee jee bhee tumhaare sasur ko patr likh rahe hain
meree taraph se tum sabhee ko nyauta de dena
shesh sab kushal hai
meree aur se ghar mein sabhee ko yatha yogy kahana
dev jee ko aashish aur pyaar
unhen kahana himmat badhae rakhana
apane pyaar ke saath
tumhaaree maan
nirmala
maan ka patr veena ko bhaavuk kar gaya
aansuon kee aviral dhaara bahane lagee
dev ne dekha poochha kya likha hai
bas adhik kuchh nahin
aapaka haal poochha hai aur rajanee kee shaadee mein aane ko kaha hai
apane se chhotee rajanee ka chitr usakee aankhon mein ghoom raha tha
tabhee vah aur adhik bhaavuk ho chalee thee
sunakar dev bhee prasann mudra mein aa gaya
bola haan shaadee mein jaana jaruree hai
kab jaana chaahogee
jab aap chalane ko kahenge
kolej se bhee to chhuttee lenee hogee
kaha veena ne
dev ne kuchh socha aur kaha main jarur jaana chaahata hoon
par mera man nahin maanata
aisee dasha mein mera jaana uchit bhee nahin
kyon uchit nahin sabhee ko ab maaloom hai tumhaaree dasha ka
vyarth mat socho kuchh bhee
veena ne use samajhaaya
dev gambheer ho utha
bola dasha to kaheen bhee kabhee bhee bigad sakatee hai
aur kuchh nahin to shaadee kee raunak mein dard hua tab bhee sab pheeka pad jaega
mai shaadee kee raunak mein kuchh khalal nahin daalana chaahata
tum jarur jao
amit tumhen le jaega
maan ko bhee saath le jaana
aisa kyon kahate ho har baat mein apana duhkh kyon ujaagar karate ho
duhkh ko bhoolana padega hamen
jo hai usee mein sukh paane kee koshish karo dev
veena ne use samajhaaya
vah bhaavuk ho chalee thee
bolatee rahee main tumhaare bina nahin ja sakatee
meree akelee upasthiti mein bhee koee vahaan khushee nahin mana paega
main bhee tabhee jaoongee jab tum jaoge
varana rajanee vidaee ke baad hamen dillee mein milatee huee chalee jaegee
tum theek kah rahee ho veena lekin svayan socho
meree upasthiti mein bhee to sabhee kee najaren mujh par hee rahengee aur sab shaadee ko bhoolakar mujhase hee mera haal poochhate rahenge
main shaadee kee raunak mein bistar par leta to sab pheeka pad jaega
main aise mein nahin jaana chaahata
tum meree baat ko samajho veena main tumhen khushee se kah raha hoon
tum jarur jaana main tumhaare bina rah loonga
aur yah kahakar dev kee rulaee chhoot gaee
veena ne bhee nirnay kar liya tha akele na jaane ka
